review:
Let me just start by saying that I wouldn't travel for 45 kilometres if it weren't for Dr Aggarwal as my dentist. I wouldn't let anyone else remove my teeth (4 of them). 
I usually don't get convinced easily but when I met Dr Aggarwal, I knew I had to get my braces from him and him only. Oh how he explained the process, the science behind the treatment, answers to my doubts and anything and everything. 
I started with my treatment in Jan 2016 and to date I never had a problem with timings, appointment reschedules or the treatment itself. Well, except this one time because of a confusing text when Dr Aggarwal thought it was rude of me to say that I had to manage a lot of things to come to Delhi on a Sunday which the original appointment was for, unfortunately the receptionist didn't realise that she gave me an appointment on a Sunday. Genuine mistake, of course. But then we cleared the air nicely soon on my next visit.

Regarding the treatment, in a nutshell I am super happy after I have gotten the braces off. My teeth are very well adjusted and I have no pain or discomfort whatsoever. I still wear my retainers. 

I went for 3M transparent braces. Treatment was super expensive, given the cost of braces, retainers and 2 teeth crowns. Again I went for the top quality ones (with everything). My treatment did cost a lot (around 80,000 Rs) but I do have to say this "it was worth every penny." 

Getting braces will hurt like hell, sleepless nights, sickening health because of not being able to eat most of the times, difficulties in talking and other unwanted associated problems that you get with this package. However, despite a long battle of 1.5 years it will always be worth your efforts to get healthy teeth and gums. I tend to think that it's okay to be uncomfortable for all this time than regretting it later in life that we should have gotten it done when we could. Getting your teeth adjusted is much better than getting them pulled out of your mouth. Originals are the best (I hope everyone would agree).

I do recommend (sorry STRONGLY recommend, can't emphasise this enough) Dr Aggarwal if you need a dental treatment. AND...If you want to understand the treatment well, would like to go to a well-equipped, hygienic clinic, looking for a dentist who would NOT simply treat you for anything to make some money, want your dentist to be polite and supportive, and of all importance...for ***** results possible, go to Delhi Dental Cosmetics. And hey, it's walking distance from GTB Nagar Metro Station...is it great or what?!

I respect Dr Aggarwal as a dentist. Not just for MY treatment. 

PS: No one paid me or gave me any discount to write all this. ;) I am a writer (of sorts), sorry you had to deal with this (reading a long text), yet I hope this addresses (articulates rather) all possible things you needed to know about the clinic and of course, Dr Animesh Aggarwal. I thank you for your time.

review:
I visited Dr Animesh Agarwal after doing extensive research online ** *** **** ************* ********* ** *** ******* His online reputation was way beyond amazing and I was convinced that I wanted to get my dental braces from him. After a brief period of 6 months, my braces were off and I was able to take a look at my well-alligned teeth. I am highly impressed by the end results and would like to thank Dr Animesh and Dr Neha for their astonishing work.

Hi,

My sincere thanks to Dr Animesh Agarwal as he gave my old tooth a new life by his efforts.

My issue was regarding problem in my root canal...I have got my Root Canal done from a doctor in a private hospital long back...Few days back in the RCT area i could feel the pain and could see the swelling in my gums...I visited that Doctor from where i have got treated and he told me to get tooth implantation..At such a young age of 25,I dont want to get the tooth implantated..I asked him if there‚Äôs any substitute, so he told me that we can give a try by doing re-RCT but we are not sure that whether tooth will b able to survive or not. I visited 3-4 doctors more to have their opinion on the same and I got mixed reviews where some of them told that my tooth will not be able to survive and i should go with implantation procedure while the others suggested me me go with re-RCT.

Meanwhile, someone suggested to me visit Dr Animesh‚Äôs clinic as well..I went to his clinic and met him.. First impression say much and working in a clean environment is essential for every medical staff...The clinic is very neat and clean everytime i have visited the clinic for my treatment.

He checked my tooth thoroughly and at first instance he told me your tooth will survive and there‚Äôs no need for implantation. He checked my tooth with OPG report and showed me the infected area and explained me everything in detail..I felt extremely satisfied with his advice at each step he gave and started treatment with him. 
Now i have got my re RCT done and my swelling has gone and tooth is fine.

All thanks to Dr Animesh for his sincere efforts and cost effective treatment.

review:
A cosy, hygienic and well designed clinic close to my home with one of the most wonderful doctors I've ever come across. My teeth were a total mess, a criss-cross jungle inside my mouth had made me super self conscious. I was 11 years old, in 2007 when I had got my first set of braces in Nagpur, an attempt which went horribly bad. I had again gotten braces, in 2009, this time from a reputed clinic in Bhopal, my subsequent base change to Delhi in 2011 due to which there could not be a proper closure to my treatment, and my insincerity in wearing my retainers had led to a huge gap formation in between my two front teeth by 2014, I got new retainers made by Medanta, Gurgaon but overall the teeth never went back to being straight, nice and gap-less. I had started feeling bad about the way my teeth had started looking, tilted to the sides with wide gaps! I was frantically looking for good Orthodontists in Delhi in July 2017, that I came across Dr. Animesh Agarwal, I read a few reviews and quickly booked an appointment. The office was good in coordinating and the next day I was in his clinic. Alongside being cordial and humble, he is excellent in what he does. 
I remember explaining my case history to him, he was all ears and made me really comfortable. An X-ray later, he was quick to explain my parents what had gone wrong and how can it be rectified.
I remember getting braces that day itself (for the third time in my life). Time has passed by quickly and my teeth are almost straight now (again, and hopefully will always remain so!). I'll be getting my braces off soon. ****** ******* ******* ** *********** *** ** *** **** ******** ** *** ******** considering that he was also the official dentist of the President of India, Mr Pranab Mukherjee. I am absolutely grateful that I got an opportunity to get my treatment done by him. Thank you!
